title: Inside a Dark Adtech Empire Fed by Fake CAPTCHAs
summary: Late last year, security researchers made a startling discovery: Kremlin-backed disinformation campaigns were bypassing moderation on social media platforms by leveraging the same malicious advertising technology that powers a sprawling ecosystem of online hucksters and website hackers. title: Trend Micro fixes critical vulnerabilities in multiple products
summary: Trend Micro has released security updates to address multiple critical-severity remote code execution and authentication bypass vulnerabilities that impact its Apex Central and Endpoint Encryption (TMEE) PolicyServer products. [...]

title: Google Cloud and Cloudflare hit by widespread service outages
summary: Google Cloud and Cloudflare are investigating ongoing outages impacting access to sites and various services across multiple regions. [...]

title: WordPress Sites Turned Weapon: How VexTrio and Affiliates Run a Global Scam Network
summary:
The threat actors behind the VexTrio Viper Traffic Distribution Service (TDS) have been linked to other TDS services like Help TDS and Disposable TDS, indicating that the sophisticated cybercriminal operation is a sprawling enterprise of its own that's designed to distribute malicious content.
